alert.note: Alert for Canadian (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 05 at 6:55PM CDT until September 06 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GRADY...NORTHWESTERN CLEVELAND...SOUTHEASTERN CANADIAN AND NORTHWESTERN MCCLAIN COUNTIES... At 655 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bridge Creek, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Oklahoma City, southwestern Norman, Moore, Newcastle, Tuttle, Goldsby, and Bridge Creek. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
